00006 static const bool no_clipping=false;

00008 static int edge_pair(IplImage *im, int sum[], int _a[2], int _b[2], int _c[2], int _d[2])
00009 {
00010         int a[2];
00011         int b[2];
00012         int c[2];
00013         int d[2];
00014 
00015         if (_a[1] > _b[1]) {
00016                 b[0] = _a[0];
00017                 b[1] = _a[1];
00018                 a[0] = _b[0];
00019                 a[1] = _b[1];
00020         } else {
00021                 a[0] = _a[0];
00022                 a[1] = _a[1];
00023                 b[0] = _b[0];
00024                 b[1] = _b[1];
00025         }
00026 
00027         if (_c[1] > _d[1]) {
00028                 d[0] = _c[0];
00029                 d[1] = _c[1];
00030                 c[0] = _d[0];
00031                 c[1] = _d[1];
00032         } else {
00033                 c[0] = _c[0];
00034                 c[1] = _c[1];
00035                 d[0] = _d[0];
00036                 d[1] = _d[1];
00037         }
00038 
00039         int y_start = MAX(a[1], c[1]);
00040         int y_stop = MIN(b[1], d[1]);
00041 
00042         if (y_start >= y_stop) return 0;
00043 
00044         if (y_start < 0) {
00045                 if (no_clipping) return 0;
00046                 y_start = 0;
00047         }
00048         if (y_stop >= im->height) {
00049                 if (no_clipping) return 0;
00050                 y_stop = im->height - 1;
00051         }
00052         
00053         float slope1 = float(b[0] - a[0])/float(b[1]-a[1]);
00054         float delta1 = a[0] - slope1*a[1];
00055 
00056         float slope2 = float(d[0] - c[0])/float(d[1]-c[1]);
00057         float delta2 = c[0] - slope2*c[1];
00058 
00059         int x_step = im->nChannels;
00060         assert (im->depth == IPL_DEPTH_8U);
00061 
00062         int r=0;
00063 
00064         for (int y = y_start; y<y_stop; ++y) {
00065 
00066                 float fy = (float) y;
00067                 float x1 = slope1 * fy + delta1;
00068                 float x2 = slope2 * fy + delta2;
00069                 float minx = (x1 < x2 ? x1 : x2);
00070                 int maxx = (int)(x1 > x2 ? x1 : x2);
00071                 if (maxx < 0) continue;
00072                 int x_start = (int)minx;
00073                 if (x_start > im->width) {
00074                         if (no_clipping) return 0;
00075                         continue;
00076                 }
00077                 if (x_start < 0) {
00078                         if (no_clipping) return 0;
00079                         x_start = 0;
00080                 }
00081 
00082                 if (maxx >= im->width) maxx=im->width-1;
00083                 int len = maxx-x_start;
00084                 if (len >0) {
00085                         r += len;
00086                         unsigned char *ptr = (unsigned char *)im->imageData + y*im->widthStep + x_start*x_step;
00087 
00088                         if (im->nChannels>1) 
00089                                 for (int x=0; x<len; ++x) {
00090                                         for (int c=0;c<im->nChannels;++c) {
00091                                                 sum[c] += *ptr++;
00092                                         }
00093                                 } 
00094                         else
00095                                 for (int x=0; x<len; ++x)
00096                                         sum[0] += *ptr++;
00097                 }
00098         }
00099         return r;
00100 }

00114 int stat_triangle(IplImage *im, int pts[3][2], float avg[3]) 
00115 {
00116         int sum[3] = {0,0,0};
00117         // for every edge pair...
00118         int a = edge_pair(im, sum, pts[0], pts[1], pts[0], pts[2]);
00119         int b = edge_pair(im, sum, pts[0], pts[1], pts[1], pts[2]);
00120         int c = edge_pair(im, sum, pts[1], pts[2], pts[0], pts[2]);
00121         int tot = a+b+c;
00122         if (no_clipping) {
00123                 if (a==0 || b==0 || c==0) tot=0;
00124         }
00125         if (tot>0) {
00126                 float ftot = (float)tot;
00127                 avg[0] = float(sum[0])/ftot;
00128                 avg[1] = float(sum[1])/ftot;
00129                 avg[2] = float(sum[2])/ftot;
00130         } else {
00131                 avg[0] = avg[1] = avg[2] = -1;
00132         }
00133         if (im->nChannels==1) {
00134                 avg[1] = avg[2] = -1;
00135         }
00136         return tot;
00137 }
